name: chroninotes
description: Offline-first desktop productivity assistant for students

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run rebuild
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && npm run build && electron .
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n FE,BE -c cyan,green "npm run dev:frontend" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && npm run dev:backend"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
